Another Auckland bus attack: Asian woman allegedly robbed on route No 70https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/another-auckland-bus-attack-asian-woman-allegedly-robbed-on-route-no-70/PI55QTMBGRFVXMQ3S4N6VO652I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/another-auckland-bus-attack-asian-woman-allegedly-robbed-on-route-no-70/PI55QTMBGRFVXMQ3S4N6VO652I/ 'These kids will ruin NZ’s reputation as it is not a safe place anymore.' Sat, 03 Aug 2024 01:06:27 +0000 Anna Zhang, a mother to a primary school-aged girl and self-described as being small in stature, said she moved to New Zealand thinking it was safe. Friday night’s incident changed her mind, made her regret the move, and has prompted her to warn others wanting to move here to stay away. Photo / Hayden Woodward
